official_title: To maintain grade, size, and quality standards for fresh papaya.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as reenacted and amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to require that imports of fresh papaya meet all marketing order grade, size, and quality requirements imposed on domestic fresh papaya.

titles.title: To maintain grade, size, and quality standards for fresh papaya.
